allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix evaluator to compute regression metrics in original scale

The evaluator was passing ScaledNumeric objects as y_true to sklearn
metrics, which failed. Now properly unwraps ScaledNumeric and applies
inverse transform so both y_true and y_pred are in original scale.

Also adds mse, mae, rmse to the metrics registry and new dependencies
\(pyarrow, sqlglot\) for upcoming SQL query support.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git tag -a v2.0.0a2 -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Release 2.0.0a2

New features:
- Accelerate multi-GPU support with gradient accumulation
- Checkpoint resumption for spot instance training \(for cloud spot instances\)
- Numba parallel grammar mask computation \(optional dependency\)
- SDPA \(scaled_dot_product_attention\) in cached transformer
- DataLoader worker thread contention fix when using Numba

Bug fixes:
- Removed unused pyarrow and sqlglot dependencies
- Fixed Numba thread contention with multiple DataLoader workers
EOF
\)")
